thread.title: Kim Zolciak Leaves Husband Kroy, Refuses To Renew Vows During Vacation
thread.title_full: Kim Zolciak Leaves Husband Kroy, Refuses To Renew Vows During Vacation

author: Radar Staff
title: Kim Zolciak Leaves Husband Kroy, Refuses To Renew Vows During Vacation
text:
Mar 28, 2017 @ 17:10PM 

Kim Zolciak Biermann and Kroy Biermann are putting their vow renewals on hold after the mom-of-six got a case of cold feet in Italy! 
“I asked Kroy to, I guess, renew our vows,” Kim confessed in a video she sent to The Daily Dish from a gondola ride on their vacation. “I don’t know if I asked you or I told him or something.” 
“And then I got on this gondola and I’m super anxious and really nervous and wanted it to be beautiful like a postcard, but and maybe it’ll look that way but I don’t feel that way,” she added. “So, anyways, he’s locked in forever.” 
“She told me she had planned this whole big thing to renew our vows,” Kroy added, confirming that he was “locked in” to the Cartier bracelet she gifted him. 
Kim, 38, and Kroy, 31, tied the knot in 2011 after meeting at an Atlanta-based charity event. They have four children together — KJ , 5, Kash , 4, and 3-year-old twins Kaia and Kane . 
Kroy also adopted Kim’s children from previous relationships — Brielle , 20, and Ariana , 16. 
The couple went on their belated honeymoon in 2015, and shared a sexy snap for her fourth wedding anniversary later that year. 
The former Real Housewives of Atlanta star has continued to share naked snaps of her husband on social media since, despite her daughters’ disapproval — and they even packed on the PDA during a recent vacation. 
PHOTOS: Like Mother, Like Daughter! Kim Zolciak Defends Brielle’s Sexy Bikini Photos & Her Relationship With Boyfriend 
But, their marriage was tested for a short time after Kroy was cut from the Atlanta Falcons and relocated to play for the Buffalo Bills following Kim’s stroke. He was only in New York for two short weeks before he was cut again and returned home. 
Kim has since expressed her desire to have a sixth child , telling RadarOnline.com exclusively that the timing would be perfect “when Kroy isn’t in the NFL and [she’s] not filming every day.” 
“It would be nice to have a baby and enjoy it,” she explained. “I dream it would be so nice to have a baby and just go home and relax.” 
Stay with Radar for more.
